landingContent.heading: Talk To Your PDF
landingContent.subHeading: Toss In A PDF Fire Off Your Questions, And Get Real-Time Answers Like You Are Chatting With A Friend.

landingWorks.title: How it works ?
landingWorks.p1: • Upload your PDF document using the upload button.
landingWorks.p2: • The system processes the document to extract relevant information.
landingWorks.p3: • Ask questions about the content of your PDF.
landingWorks.p4: • Receive accurate and context-aware answers in real-time.
